UNIVERSITY PARK • PENNSYLVANIA
College of Education
Department of Educational Services
Burrowes Building
October 13, 1961.
Samuel L. Becker, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa.
Dear Mr. Becker:
According to present plans I should "be in Washington
for the convention, and will plan to meet with the Research
Group for the Breakfast meeting Tuesday at 8:00 a.m.
Very/ t/uly/yours,
H. Dennis Sherk
Dept, of Ed. Services
